episodes.title: North Korean Drug Smugglers, Aussie Cult leader Anne Hamilton-Byrne
episodes.description:
Retired Australian Police Officer, Mark Tregellas, returns to TPS to tell some more stories from his time policing the Australian bush! 

Mark's Book - Backup Is Three Hours Away

https://www.simonandschuster.com/books/Backup-is-Three-Hours-Away/Mark-Tregellas/9781923144286

 

Contact Steve - steve@thingspolicesee.com
